Literature.Title: Discovery of novel antimicrobial peptides, Brevilaterin V, from Brevibacillus laterosporus S62-9 after regulated by exogenously-added L-valine.
Literature.Author: Chen Z, Wang X, Han P, Liu Y, Hong D, Li S, Ma A, Jia Y

Literature.Title: Characterization of brevilaterins, multiple antimicrobial peptides simultaneously produced by Brevibacillus laterosporus S62-9, and their application in real food system.
Literature.Author: Ning Y, Han P, Ma J, Liu Y, Fu Y, Wang Z, Jia Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:53.6±7.7% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:18.43 ± 3.27% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:6.7 ± 2.26% Hemolysis=125 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:2.06 ± 0.94% Hemolysis=62.5 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:0.37 ± 1.41% Hemolysis=31.25 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=15.63 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CICC 10269(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii CICC 10980(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis CICC 21516(no activity data),Serratia marcescens CICC 10898(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 63302(MIC=2.15µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=4.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 44752(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CMCC 50041(MIC=62.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens ATCC 13525(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Penicillium citrinum ATCC 10106(MIC=31.25µg/ml),Aspergillus brasiliensis ATCC 16404(MIC=62.5µg/ml)
